title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1552.1 - Purpose and scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1552.1 - Purpose and scope

State Regulations
(a) It is the
responsibility and the intent of the State University Construction Fund to
comply fully with the provisions of article 6-A of the Public Officers Law, the

Personal Privacy Protection Law. (b) The fund shall maintain in its records only such personal information that is
relevant and necessary to accomplish a purpose of the fund that is required to
be accomplished by statute or executive order, or to implement a program
specifically authorized by law. (c) Personal information will be collected, whenever practicable, directly from the
person to whom the information pertains. (d) The fund will seek to ensure that all
records pertaining to or used with respect to individuals are accurate, relevant, timely and complete. (e) This Part provides information regarding the procedures by which members of the
public may assert rights granted by the Personal Privacy Protection

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1552.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
